content.description: Kiara is a skilled interior designer who can visualize multiple design options for a given room. She can present her clients with different versions of what the space could look like and is highly regarded for her creativity and expertise. Her clients almost always choose one of her designs.
content.question: Which of the following concepts best explains why Kiara has such a talent for generating multiple potential solutions for her clients?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
